Since the Revolutionary War, Native Americans have fought to defend our nation and it‚Äôs time that we provide them with culturally appropriate mental health care as a part of the holistic care that Native veterans receive from VA.

My bill would expand VA health care to cover vets struggling with infertility, regardless of marital status, service-connection, or need for donated genetic material. Our vets put their lives on the line to protect our families, the least we can do is help them build theirs.
